data.lyric:
[ti:Get Along]
[ar:Kenny Chesney]
[al:Get Along]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Get Along - Kenny Chesney (肯尼·切斯尼)
[00:05.15]Written by：Josh Osborne/Shane McAnally/Ross Copperman
[00:10.30]Met a man wearin' a T-shirt says Virginia is for lovers
[00:15.35]Had a Bible in his left hand and a bottle in the other
[00:19.87]
[00:20.72]He says All you're really given is the sunshine and your name
[00:25.28]
[00:26.43]We both started laughin' when the sky started to rain
[00:30.26]
[00:30.92]Get along on down the road
[00:32.73]
[00:33.25]We've got a long long way to go
[00:35.35]
[00:35.98]Scared to live scared to die
[00:37.97]
[00:38.70]We ain't perfect but we try
[00:40.60]
[00:41.16]Get along while we can
[00:43.17]
[00:43.85]Always give love the upper hand
[00:45.71]
[00:46.32]Paint a wall learn to dance
[00:48.29]
[00:48.95]Call your mom buy a boat
[00:50.98]
[00:51.64]Drink a beer sing a song
[00:53.53]
[00:54.28]Make a friend can't we all get along
[00:57.35]
[01:02.13]Saw a model on a billboard 1-800 get to know me
[01:07.25]Wondered was she photoshopped or were her eyes really that lonely
[01:11.67]
[01:13.16]Did she leave her hometown thinkin' she'd end up in L.A.
[01:16.99]
[01:18.24]Did she break down in the desert and get stuck beside the highway
[01:22.06]
[01:22.85]Get along on down the road
[01:24.47]
[01:25.23]We've got a long long way to go
[01:27.28]
[01:27.93]Scared to live scared to die
[01:29.65]
[01:30.50]We ain't perfect but we try
[01:32.53]
[01:33.06]Get along while we can
[01:35.15]
[01:35.69]Always give love the upper hand
[01:37.64]
[01:38.23]Paint a wall learn to dance
[01:40.09]
[01:40.76]Call your mom buy a boat
[01:42.68]
[01:43.28]Drink a beer sing a song
[01:45.46]
[01:46.03]Make a friend can't we all get along
[01:49.27]
[02:10.22]We find out when you die the keys to heaven can't be bought
[02:14.17]
[02:15.23]We still don't know what love is but we sure know what it's not
[02:19.58]Sometimes you got to
[02:20.97]Get along on down the road
[02:23.58]We've got a long long way to go
[02:25.47]
[02:26.20]Scared to live scared to die
[02:28.25]
[02:28.76]We ain't perfect but we try
[02:30.79]
[02:31.34]Get along while we can
[02:33.92]Always give love the upper hand
[02:35.91]
[02:36.48]Paint a wall learn to dance
[02:38.55]
[02:39.17]Call your mom buy a boat
[02:41.73]Drink a beer sing a song
[02:43.76]
[02:44.40]Make a friend can't we all get along
data.trans:
[ti:Get Along]
[ar:Kenny Chesney]
[al:Get Along]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.15]//
[00:10.30]遇见一个穿着T恤的男人 他说弗吉尼亚是爱情天堂
[00:15.35]他左手拿着圣经 右手拿着酒瓶
[00:19.87]
[00:20.72]他说 你们沐浴着阳光 要捍卫自己的荣誉
[00:25.28]
[00:26.43]当天空开始落雨 我们都开怀大笑
[00:30.26]
[00:30.92]在前进的路上相偎相依
[00:32.73]
[00:33.25]我们还有漫长的征程
[00:35.35]
[00:35.98]畏惧生活 畏惧死亡
[00:37.97]
[00:38.70]我们并不完美 但我们拼尽全力
[00:40.60]
[00:41.16]我们要在有限的生命里和睦相处
[00:43.17]
[00:43.85]心中总会充满爱意
[00:45.71]
[00:46.32]尽情挥洒 尽情摇摆
[00:48.29]
[00:48.95]让你的妈妈给你买条船 让我们荡漾在水面上
[00:50.98]
[00:51.64]喝着啤酒 纵情高歌
[00:53.53]
[00:54.28]交个朋友 我们会和睦相处
[00:57.35]
[01:02.13]那个在广告牌上的模特会知道我的大名
[01:07.25]想知道为何她如此美艳 但眼神却透露着孤独
[01:11.67]
[01:13.16]她离开她的家乡了吗 她会在洛杉矶终老
[01:16.99]
[01:18.24]她会在绝境中一蹶不振吗 是否会在半路停滞不前
[01:22.06]
[01:22.85]在前进的路上相偎相依
[01:24.47]
[01:25.23]我们还有漫长的征程
[01:27.28]
[01:27.93]畏惧生活 畏惧死亡
[01:29.65]
[01:30.50]我们并不完美 但我们拼尽全力
[01:32.53]
[01:33.06]我们要在有限的生命里和睦相处
[01:35.15]
[01:35.69]心中总会充满爱意
[01:37.64]
[01:38.23]尽情挥洒 尽情摇摆
[01:40.09]
[01:40.76]让你的妈妈给你买条船 让我们荡漾在水面上
[01:42.68]
[01:43.28]喝着啤酒 纵情高歌
[01:45.46]
[01:46.03]交个朋友 我们会和睦相处
[01:49.27]
[02:10.22]当你死去 我们才知道真相 死亡是我们必须要面临的事情
[02:14.17]
[02:15.23]我们仍不了解爱情 但是我们能明辨是非
[02:19.58]有时候这也是情非得已
[02:20.97]在前进的路上相偎相依
[02:23.58]我们还有漫长的征程
[02:25.47]
[02:26.20]畏惧生活 畏惧死亡
[02:28.25]
[02:28.76]我们并不完美 但我们拼尽全力
[02:30.79]
[02:31.34]我们要在有限的生命里和睦相处
[02:33.92]心中总会充满爱意
[02:35.91]
[02:36.48]尽情挥洒 尽情摇摆
[02:38.55]
[02:39.17]让你的妈妈给你买条船 让我们荡漾在水面上
[02:41.73]喝着啤酒 纵情高歌
[02:43.76]
[02:44.40]交个朋友 我们会和睦相处
